dr.evolution.alignment
Interface PatternList

All Superinterfaces:
Identifiable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>, java.io.Serializable, TaxonList
All Known Subinterfaces:
Alignment, SiteList
All Known Implementing Classes:
Alignment.Abstract, AscertainedSitePatterns, BootstrapPatterns, CharSetAlignment, CompleteHistorySimulator, ConvertAlignment, GapStrippedAlignment, HiddenLinkageModel, HypermutantAlignment, JackknifePatterns, PairedSitePatterns, Patterns, ResamplePatterns, ShuffledSiteList, SimpleAlignment, SimpleSiteList, SitePatterns, WrappedAlignment
public interface PatternList
extends TaxonList, Identifiable

interface for any list of patterns with weights.

Version:

Andrew Rambaut
